HotelElement.Name: Residence Inn by Marriott Dallas Addison/Quorum Drive

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Residence Inn by Marriott Addison in Dallas (Addison - Galleria), you'll be minutes from Addison Circle Park and Water Tower Theater. This aparthotel is within close proximity of Celestial Park and Quorum Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 150 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Conveniences include desks and separate sitting areas, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a 24-hour fitness center.

Dining
Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held on select days. A complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Dallas? This aparthotel has facilities measuring 912 square feet (82 square meters), including a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held on select days. A complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

The preferred airport for Residence Inn by Marriott Addison is Dallas, TX (DFW-Dallas-Fort Worth Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
